body_html:
I just reran the test in latest TensorFlow and it works if you use GPU.
On CPU I still get NaN's (there should be no NaNs)

export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=
python svd_test.py

u any NaNs: True
u all NaNs: True
matrix0 any NaNs: False

body:
I just reran the test in latest TensorFlow and it works if you use GPU.
On CPU I still get NaN's (there should be no NaNs)

```
export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=
python svd_test.py

u any NaNs: True
u all NaNs: True
matrix0 any NaNs: False
```
